languages.text: "Уж будьте любезны, капитан, превозмогите. Могу зачитать пару-тройку параграфов из устава, чтобы привести вас в тонус".
"You will indeed, Captain. If you like, I can recite a few paragraphs from the regulations to enthuse you."
languages.original_text: "Уж будьте любезны, капитан, превозмогите. Могу зачитать пару-тройку параграфов из устава, чтобы привести вас в тонус".

traits.locale_text: "You will indeed, Captain. If you like, I can recite a few paragraphs from the regulations to light a fire under you."
"You will indeed, Captain. If you like, I can recite a few paragraphs from the regulations to light a fire under you."
"You will indeed, Captain. If you like, I can recite a few paragraphs from the regulations to light a fire under you."
"You will indeed, Captain. If you like, I can recite a few paragraphs from the regulations to enthuse you."
"You will indeed, Captain. If you like, I can recite a few paragraphs from the regulations to enthuse you."
"You will indeed, Captain. If you like, I can recite a few paragraphs from the regulations to enthuse you."

languages.text: «Así será, capitán. Si quiere, puedo recitarle unos pocos apartados de las normas para ver si se anima».
languages.original_text: "You will indeed, Captain. If you like, I can recite a few paragraphs from the regulations to enthuse you."

traits.locale_text: «Así será, capitán. Si quiere, puedo recitarle unos pocos apartados de las normas para ver si se anima».

languages.text: 「その通りです、中隊長。お望みなら、規定の一部を朗読して励ましますよ」
languages.original_text: "You will indeed, Captain. If you like, I can recite a few paragraphs from the regulations to enthuse you."

traits.locale_text: 「その通りです、中隊長。お望みなら、規定の一部を朗読して励ましますよ」

languages.text: “你一定能做得到，上尉。如果你愿意的话，我可以立刻背诵几段规章制度来鼓励你。”
languages.original_text: "You will indeed, Captain. If you like, I can recite a few paragraphs from the regulations to enthuse you."

traits.locale_text: “你一定能做得到，上尉。如果你愿意的话，我可以立刻背诵几段规章制度来鼓励你。”

languages.text: "Das werdet ihr in der Tat, Captain. Wenn Ihr wollt, rezitiere ich einige Paragraphen aus den Regularien, um Euch in inspirieren."
languages.original_text: "You will indeed, Captain. If you like, I can recite a few paragraphs from the regulations to enthuse you."

traits.locale_text: "Das werdet ihr in der Tat, Captain. Wenn Ihr wollt, rezitiere ich einige Paragraphen aus den Regularien, um Euch in inspirieren."

languages.text: « En effet, capitaine. Si vous le souhaitez, pour vous motiver, je peux vous réciter quelques paragraphes du règlement. »
languages.original_text: "You will indeed, Captain. If you like, I can recite a few paragraphs from the regulations to enthuse you."

traits.locale_text: « En effet, capitaine. Si vous le souhaitez, pour vous motiver, je peux vous réciter quelques paragraphes du règlement. »

languages.text: "Gerçekten de geleceksiniz Kaptan. Dilerseniz şevk vermesi için size mevzuattan birkaç paragraf okuyabilirim."
languages.original_text: "You will indeed, Captain. If you like, I can recite a few paragraphs from the regulations to enthuse you."
